import React from 'react' import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' import { Container, Form, FormControl, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const NavBar = ({ handleSubmit, handleChange }) => { const userLoggedIn = useSelector((state) => { return state.userLoggedIn.data }) console.log(userLoggedIn) return (
NR OMDB
{!userLoggedIn ? `LogIn` : `Signed in as: Nacho Rodriguez`}
) }
